name: Creamy Garlic and Herb Butter Sauce
author: Trisha Benson
summary: Amazing butter sauce can be used on anything from seafood to leftover chicken or beef to potatoes. Quick, easy, creamy, and delicious!
ingredients: sea salt and finely ground black pepper, to taste
5 tablespoons butter, cut into small pieces
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place garlic cloves in a small baking dish and toss with oil to coat
Bake in the preheated oven until cloves are light golden brown, about 15 minutes
Combine garlic and hot stock in a blender
Add cream, butter, parsley, oregano, and thyme; process until completely blended
Transfer sauce to a container and allow to cool, about 10 minutes
Reheat the sauce over low heat when ready to serve
